item.title: Change music track
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: The application is great, but it would be nicer if you could change the song. Well that’s ideal because today we're integrating a musical playlist!

item.title: Play music
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Brick after brick, our application is taking shape! But it's only visual for now... so let’s bring all those dummy controls to life!

item.title: Volume display
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: We are almost done with the first big implementation phase of our main page. We'll now move on to the volume control!

item.title: Media playback controls
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: More and more buttons! In this chapter, we will integrate the controls for manipulating the media.
